Package emissary.output.filter

Interface IDropOffFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFilter, AbstractRollableFilter, DataFilter, JsonOutputFilter, XmlOutputFilter
public interface IDropOffFilter
Interface for drop off filter.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    PRE_SORTED
    Used in params when filter should understand that the List of incoming records is presorted value is "PRE_SORTED_RECORDS"
    static final int
    STATUS_FAILURE
    Successful filter return value -1
    static final int
    STATUS_OUTPUT_STREAM_FAILURE
    Failed writing to filter's target output stream -2
    static final int
    STATUS_SUCCESS
    Failed filter return value 1
    static final String
    TLD_PARAM
    Used to param the TLD to the filter that don't get the whole list

  • Method Details

    • getFilterName

      String getFilterName()
      Return the name of this filter

    • setFilterName

      void setFilterName(String s)
      Set the name of the filter

    • initialize

      void initialize(Configurator configG, String filterName)
      Initialization phase hook for the filter using default preferences for the runtime filter configuration
      Parameters:
      configG - passed in configuration object, usually DropOff's
      filterName - the configured name of this filter or null for the default

    • initialize

      void initialize(Configurator configG, String filterName, Configurator filterConfig)
      Initialization phase hook for the filter
      Parameters:
      configG - passed in configuration object, usually DropOff's
      filterName - the configured name of this filter or null for the default
      filterConfig - configuration for specific runtime filter

      Parameters:

      params - map of params
      Returns:
      status value

    • filter

      int filter(List<IBaseDataObject> list, Map<String,Object> params)
      Run the filter for a set of documents
      Parameters:
      list - collection of IBaseDataObject to run the filter on
      params - map of params
      Returns:
      status value

    • filter

      int filter(IBaseDataObject d, Map<String,Object> params, OutputStream output)
      Run the filter for a document
      Parameters:
      d - the document
      params - map of params
      output - the output stream to log the data onto
      Returns:
      status value

    • isOutputtable

      boolean isOutputtable(IBaseDataObject d, Map<String,Object> params)
      Determine if the payload is outputtable by the filter
      Parameters:
      d - the document
      params - map of params
      Returns:
      true if the filter wants a crack at outputting this payload

    • isOutputtable

      boolean isOutputtable(List<IBaseDataObject> list, Map<String,Object> params)
      Determine if the payload list is outputtable by the filter
      Parameters:
      list - collection of IBaseDataObject to check for outputtability
      params - map of params
      Returns:
      true if the filter wants a crack at outputting this payload

    • isOutputtable

      boolean isOutputtable(IBaseDataObject d)
      Determine if the payload is outputtable by the filter
      Parameters:
      d - the IBaseDataObject to check for outputtability
      Returns:
      true if the filter will attempt to output this payload

    • isOutputtable

      boolean isOutputtable(List<IBaseDataObject> list)
      Determine if the payload list is outputtable by the filter
      Parameters:
      list - collection of IBaseDataObject to check for outputtability
      Returns:
      true if the filter will attempt to output these payload
